memories.content: Extraction API with O(1) cell lookup optimization (2026-01-06). Sync/async session handling via get_sync_db(). Performance: 1.04s for 14MB file, 99.5% cache hit rate. Extraction endpoint refactored into 6 modular files in backend/app/api/v1/endpoints/extraction/.

Security Hardening (2026-01-07, commit 7c8a87e). RBAC with 4 roles in backend/app/core/permissions.py. Token blacklist with Redis + memory fallback. Config.py uses env vars only. Fixed GlobalSearch infinite loop bug (checkpoint: globalsearch-fix 20260113_133244).

Database integration: Phase 1 COMPLETE (DealsPage API migration). ~40% overall. Properties/Deals/Extractions/Auth connected. Remaining: Transactions, Documents, Market Data, Interest Rates, Reporting APIs (Phases 2-6). Docker DEFERRED. Checkpoints: docker-removed, pre-api-consolidation, phase1-complete-deals-api-migration.

Development: conda env 'dashboard-backend'. Run './scripts/start.sh' from project root. Backend: port 8000. Frontend: port 5173. Ctrl+C stops both. User prefers automatic memory save on phase completion. Git stash apply preferred over pop for checkpoints (keeps backup).

API client: Consolidated to axios-based src/lib/api.ts (fetch client deprecated). Env vars: standardized on VITE_API_URL. Mock toggle: VITE_USE_MOCK_DATA + src/lib/config.ts utilities (USE_MOCK_DATA, IS_DEV, withMockFallback). Created useDealsWithMockFallback pattern for API hooks.

SharePoint extraction: namespace dashboard-project, scheduler EXTRACTION_SCHEDULE_CRON (2 AM), file filter .*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*. Reference: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx (1169 mappings).
